name: Groupe Viva
tag_list: media-numerique, media, affichage-numerique, affichage, numerique, reseau-de-television, tele, dynamisez, video, interactif, marketing, digital-signage, signage, digital, led, acl, transparent, menuboard, menu-digital, animation, videowall, touch-screen,
overview:
For over a decade, Groupe Viva has been developing digital innovations that enhance the customer experience in all sectors of activity. Our solutions provide the technical infrastructure, the video and audio content and the interactive applications required to bring your message wherever it is needed, be it a point of sale, a point of service or in public areas.

In addition to the technical solutions and equipment, our strength lies in providing personalised content adapted to your needs, regardless of the digital platform (tactile or static screens, LED screens, mobile devices).
